name: 马占冬
introduction: 马占冬，独立纪录片制作人。2001年始，拍摄制作纪录片及影像创作。先后独立拍摄制作纪录长片、短片十余部，作品分别在德国、荷兰、冰岛、丹麦、日本、意大利，葡萄牙，香港等国内外影展展出、放映。现在中国，四川省成都市生活、工作。第十四届北京独立影像展终审评委。第十二届FIRST青年电影展复审评委。RunDoc™的聯合創始人及總監。Ma Zhandong, independent documentary producer, who has filmed and produced tens of documentary films long and video. His works have been screened on film festivals in Germany、Netherlands、Iceland 、Denmark、France、Japan、Hongkong and etc. At the same time, he has been creating short art films and vedios. He is interviewed by ARTE(France) at 2009. He serves respectively as the final film Juror for the 14th Beijing Independent Film Exhibition in China and the shortlist juror for the 12th FIRST Youth Film Exhibition. He's now the co-founder and director of RunDoc™. Now he is living and working in Chengdu China.【节展获奖/Awards】《五月一天》获香港华语纪录片电影节2011最佳纪录片奖"One day in may" wins Chinese Documentary Festival, Champion, Features (Hong Kong)《海石湾》获第十二届中国独立影展纪录片竞赛单元人道主义奖"Laozhao" wins the 12 th China Independent Film Festival (Documentary humanitarian award)(Nanjing)《蝼蚁》获33届 ATP电视大奖赛 （ATP卓越奖）（东京）"Everybody is Nobody" wins 33rd ATP Award TV Grand Prix (ATP Award for Excellence)(Tokyo)【作品收藏/Collection】杜克大学图书馆  (美国）Duke University Library（USA）纽卡斯尔大学图书馆特别馆藏 （英国）Newcastle University Library Special Collections （UK）哥伦比亚大学东亚图书馆（美国）Columbia University East Asian Library C.
